metadata.notes: Comprehensive Lebanon Turf professional granular fertilizer catalog. Includes ProScape, Country Club, Country Club MD, Mesa, and combination product lines. All products are granular. NPK and secondary nutrient values from guaranteed analysis labels. SGN (Size Guide Number) indicates particle size. NOTE: Web search and fetch tools were unavailable during compilation. This catalog is based on training knowledge of Lebanon Turf products. Some products may have been updated, discontinued, or added since the knowledge cutoff. Recommend verifying against lebanonturf.com for the latest catalog.

proscape_16-0-8_mesa.application_notes: 50% Mesa controlled-release nitrogen for extended feeding 8-10 weeks. 2% iron for color without excessive growth. Excellent for fairways and general turf. Low dust, homogeneous granule.

proscape_19-0-6_mesa.application_notes: 50% Mesa controlled-release nitrogen for 8-10 week feeding. Higher N ratio for active growing season applications. 2% iron for enhanced color.

proscape_24-0-11_50_mesa.application_notes: High-nitrogen maintenance fertilizer with 50% Mesa slow-release nitrogen. Balanced K for stress tolerance. Ideal for sports turf and commercial properties.

proscape_25-0-5_50_mesa.application_notes: High-nitrogen with Mesa controlled-release for extended feeding. Economy formulation for large turf areas. 1% iron for color enhancement.

proscape_28-0-5_50_mesa.application_notes: Highest-nitrogen ProScape formulation with Mesa controlled-release. Economical coverage for large turf areas. 50% slow-release for 8-10 week feeding.

proscape_18-0-18_methex.application_notes: Balanced N-K formulation with Meth-Ex 40 slow-release nitrogen (methylene urea). Excellent fall/winterizer for cool-season turf. Equal N and K for cold hardiness and stress tolerance.

proscape_20-0-10_methex.application_notes: Meth-Ex 40 slow-release nitrogen (methylene urea) for gradual, extended feeding. 2:1 N:K ratio for general maintenance. Good for fairways and sports turf.

proscape_21-0-11_methex.application_notes: Meth-Ex slow-release nitrogen with 2% iron for deep green color. 2:1 N:K ratio for balanced nutrition. Low burn potential.

proscape_24-0-8_methex.application_notes: High-nitrogen Meth-Ex formulation for active growing season. Methylene urea slow-release provides 8-12 weeks of feeding. Economical N delivery.

proscape_16-0-8_dimension.application_notes: Fertilizer plus 0.10% Dimension (dithiopyr) pre-emergent herbicide for crabgrass prevention. Apply early spring before soil temps reach 55F. 50% Mesa slow-release nitrogen. 2% iron.

proscape_19-0-6_dimension.application_notes: Fertilizer plus 0.10% Dimension (dithiopyr) pre-emergent. Higher N analysis for spring green-up combined with crabgrass prevention. Mesa slow-release nitrogen.

proscape_0-0-7_dimension.application_notes: Pre-emergent herbicide (dithiopyr) carrier with potash. Zero nitrogen allows early spring pre-emergent application without forcing unwanted growth. Ideal for warm-season turf pre-emergent timing.

proscape_19-0-6_barricade.application_notes: Fertilizer plus 0.374% Barricade (prodiamine) pre-emergent herbicide. Long residual crabgrass and goosegrass control. Mesa slow-release nitrogen. Apply before weed germination.

proscape_16-0-8_barricade.application_notes: Fertilizer plus 0.374% Barricade (prodiamine) pre-emergent. Longest residual pre-emergent with balanced fertilizer. Mesa slow-release nitrogen plus 2% iron.

proscape_24_5_11_barricade.application_notes: Complete NPK fertilizer with Barricade (prodiamine) pre-emergent. For lawns needing phosphorus. Apply in early spring before crabgrass germination.

proscape_18_3_18_starter_methex.application_notes: Low-P starter formulation with Meth-Ex slow-release nitrogen. Balanced N-K for establishment. Low phosphorus to comply with state regulations while still supporting root development.

proscape_18-24-12_starter.application_notes: High-phosphorus starter fertilizer for new seedings and sod establishment. Promotes rapid root development and establishment. Use at time of seeding or sodding.

proscape_10-20-10_starter.application_notes: Balanced starter fertilizer with high phosphorus for new plantings. Promotes root growth and turf establishment. Suitable for seeding, sodding, and overseeding.

proscape_20-0-10_dimension_methex.application_notes: Meth-Ex slow-release nitrogen with Dimension (dithiopyr) pre-emergent herbicide. Dual benefit of extended feeding and crabgrass prevention in one application.

proscape_0_0_7_barricade.application_notes: Zero-nitrogen pre-emergent with Barricade (prodiamine) on potash carrier. Ideal for very early spring application when nitrogen is not desired. Long residual control of crabgrass, goosegrass, and Poa annua.

proscape_26_0_4_merit.application_notes: Fertilizer with 0.2% Merit (imidacloprid) insecticide for preventive white grub control. Apply late spring to early summer before grub egg hatch. Provides season-long grub control plus fertilization.

proscape_19_0_6_merit.application_notes: Mesa slow-release nitrogen plus 0.2% Merit (imidacloprid) for preventive grub control. Apply late spring/early summer. Controls white grubs, billbugs, and other soil insects.

proscape_24_5_11_acelepryn.application_notes: Complete fertilizer with Acelepryn (chlorantraniliprole) insecticide. Controls white grubs, annual bluegrass weevil, caterpillars, and billbugs. Season-long insect control with one application.

proscape_0_0_7_acelepryn.application_notes: Zero-nitrogen Acelepryn (chlorantraniliprole) insecticide on potash carrier. Controls grubs, ABW, caterpillars. Allows insect control timing independent of fertility needs.

proscape_22_0_4_allectus.application_notes: Fertilizer with Allectus (imidacloprid + bifenthrin) dual-active insecticide. Controls surface-feeding and soil-dwelling insects including grubs, chinch bugs, and sod webworms.

proscape_20_0_5_trimec.application_notes: Fertilizer with Trimec broadleaf weed killer (2,4-D + MCPP + dicamba). Controls dandelions, clover, plantain, and other broadleaf weeds. Apply when weeds are actively growing.

cc_16_0_8_mesa.application_notes: Premium mini-granule (SGN 100) for greens and tees. 50% Mesa controlled-release nitrogen. 2% iron and 0.5% manganese for enhanced color. Homogeneous granule for uniform distribution on fine-cut turf.

cc_18_0_18_mesa.application_notes: Premium balanced N-K mini-granule for greens and tees. 50% Mesa slow-release. Iron and manganese for color. Equal N-K promotes cold and drought hardiness. Excellent fall fertilizer for greens.

cc_22_0_10_mesa.application_notes: High-nitrogen mini-granule with Mesa controlled-release. SGN 100 for greens and tees. 2% iron for color response. Good for active growing season maintenance.

cc_5_0_10_mesa_fe_mn.product_name: Country Club 5-0-10 with 5% Fe and 2% Mn
cc_5_0_10_mesa_fe_mn.application_notes: Low-nitrogen, high-micronutrient mini-granule for greens. 5% iron and 2% manganese for color without excessive growth. Excellent for summer applications when N stimulation is unwanted.

cc_8_2_10_mesa.application_notes: Low-nitrogen, high-micronutrient greens grade. 3% iron + 1% manganese for dark green color with minimal growth push. 50% Mesa slow-release. Ideal summer greens fertilizer.

cc_10_2_10_mesa.application_notes: Balanced greens-grade fertilizer with high iron and manganese. 50% Mesa slow-release nitrogen. Low-growth formulation with enhanced color from 3% Fe and 1% Mn. SGN 100 mini-granule.

cc_12_0_12_mesa.application_notes: Balanced N-K mini-granule for greens with 3% iron. 50% Mesa controlled-release. Equal N-K ratio supports stress tolerance. Manganese for enhanced turf color.

cc_14_0_14_mesa.application_notes: Balanced 1:1 N:K greens fertilizer with Mesa slow-release. Iron and manganese for color. Mini-granule for greens and tees. Excellent transition-season product.

cc_20_0_10_mesa.application_notes: Higher-nitrogen greens-grade mini-granule with Mesa. 2:1 N:K for active growing season. 2% iron and 0.5% manganese. Homogeneous SGN 100 particle.

cc_6_2_12_mesa_4fe_2mn.product_name: Country Club 6-2-12 50% Mesa with 4% Fe, 2% Mn
cc_6_2_12_mesa_4fe_2mn.application_notes: Ultra-low nitrogen greens fertilizer with very high iron and manganese. Delivers color and micronutrients without growth stimulation. Ideal for hot summer months when minimal N is desired.

cc_md_16_0_8_mesa_bayleton.application_notes: Country Club fertilizer with Bayleton (triadimefon) fungicide. Controls dollar spot, brown patch, and other diseases. Mini-granule for greens and tees. Mesa slow-release nitrogen.

cc_md_18_0_18_eagle.application_notes: Balanced N-K fertilizer with Eagle (myclobutuanil) fungicide. Preventive and curative control of dollar spot, brown patch, anthracnose. Mini-granule for greens.

cc_md_11_0_22_dimension.application_notes: Low-nitrogen fertilizer with Dimension (dithiopyr) pre-emergent on greens-grade mini-granule. Controls Poa annua and crabgrass on greens and tees.

cc_10_0_10_dimension.application_notes: Balanced N-K greens fertilizer with Dimension pre-emergent herbicide. Controls Poa annua on greens. 3% Fe and 1% Mn for color. Mini-granule for fine-cut turf.

cc_md_18_0_18_acelepryn.application_notes: Balanced greens fertilizer with Acelepryn (chlorantraniliprole) insecticide. Season-long control of grubs, ABW, sod webworms. Mini-granule for greens and tees.

cc_md_16_0_8_acelepryn.application_notes: Mesa slow-release greens fertilizer with Acelepryn insecticide. Season-long insect control on greens and tees. 2% Fe plus 0.5% Mn.

cc_md_16_0_8_merit.application_notes: Greens-grade fertilizer with Merit (imidacloprid) for white grub prevention. Apply in late spring before egg hatch. Mini-granule with Mesa slow-release nitrogen.

mesa_5_2_0.application_notes: High-iron, high-sulfur mini-granule for greens. 6% iron, 1.5% Mn, 14% S for intense dark green color with minimal growth. MESA slow-release nitrogen. Ideal for summer color without nitrogen push.

mesa_6_0_0_15fe.application_notes: Ultra-high iron granular for intense color without growth. 15% iron and 16% sulfur. Very low nitrogen. MESA controlled-release. Use for color-only applications on fairways and roughs.

nxpro_25_0_5.application_notes: NX-Pro technology combines multiple nitrogen sources (ammonium sulfate, methylene urea, polymer-coated urea) for graduated release over 10-12 weeks. Cost-effective maintenance fertilizer.

nxpro_24_0_11.application_notes: NX-Pro multi-source nitrogen technology. Blends quick-release with multiple slow-release nitrogen forms for 10-12 weeks of graduated feeding. Good N:K balance for year-round maintenance.

nxpro_22_0_4.application_notes: NX-Pro multi-source nitrogen with 2% iron. Multiple nitrogen release rates for consistent feeding. Economical for sports turf and commercial maintenance.

nxpro_20_0_10.application_notes: NX-Pro 2:1 N:K maintenance fertilizer with multi-source nitrogen technology. 1% iron for color. Consistent feeding for 10-12 weeks.

nxpro_18_0_18.application_notes: NX-Pro balanced N-K for fall and winterizer applications. Multi-source nitrogen for graduated release. Equal N-K promotes cold hardiness and stress tolerance.

proscape_10_0_20_winterizer.application_notes: Low-nitrogen, high-potassium winterizer for late fall application. Promotes root carbohydrate storage and winter hardiness. Low N minimizes late-season top growth.

proscape_5_10_31_winterizer.application_notes: High-potassium winterizer with phosphorus for root development. Very low nitrogen. Apply in late fall for winter hardiness and early spring recovery.

proscape_21_3_21_all_purpose.application_notes: Complete NPK fertilizer with balanced N-K. Contains phosphorus for root support. Good general-purpose turf fertilizer where soil tests indicate P need.

proscape_24_5_11.application_notes: Complete NPK fertilizer for turf requiring phosphorus. Balanced formulation for general lawn maintenance. Good for new developments and soils testing low in P.

proscape_30_0_10.application_notes: Very high nitrogen for maximum coverage. Economical formulation for commercial turf maintenance. Primarily quick-release nitrogen for rapid green-up. 3:1 N:K ratio.

proscape_32_0_10.application_notes: Highest nitrogen analysis for maximum economy. Fast green-up for commercial and residential turf. Primarily quick-release nitrogen. Use lower rates in hot weather to avoid burn.

proscape_18_0_3_2fe_onetime.application_notes: One-application annual fertilizer with multiple controlled-release nitrogen technologies for season-long feeding from a single spring application. 2% iron for color. Apply at higher rate for full-season performance.

proscape_46_0_0_urea.application_notes: Straight urea nitrogen source. 100% quick-release. Most economical nitrogen source. Apply at low rates to avoid burn. Best used in cool weather or on irrigated turf. Water in promptly.

proscape_21_0_0_ammonium_sulfate.application_notes: Ammonium sulfate granular. 24% sulfur acidifies soil, enhances iron availability. Quick-release ammonium nitrogen. Ideal for alkaline soils. Promotes dark green color from sulfur.

proscape_0_0_50_sop.application_notes: Straight potash (sulfate of potash) with 18% sulfur. Chloride-free K source. Use for potassium-deficient soils. Promotes drought and cold tolerance. Low salt index.

proscape_0_0_62_mop.application_notes: Muriate of potash (potassium chloride). Most economical potassium source. Contains chloride. Best for non-sensitive turf areas. Apply and water in to reduce salt stress.

proscape_0_46_0_dap.application_notes: Diammonium phosphate. High-phosphorus source for establishment and soils testing very low in P. Quick-release nitrogen component. Use based on soil test recommendations.

proscape_organic_8_2_4.application_notes: Organic-based granular fertilizer from natural protein sources. Feeds soil biology. 1% iron for color. Low burn potential. Safe on all turf types. Higher application rate needed due to lower nutrient density.

proscape_organic_10_0_2.application_notes: Phosphorus-free organic-based fertilizer. Compliant with phosphorus restrictions. Feeds soil microbes. 2% iron for color. Natural slow-release from protein sources.

proscape_organic_7_1_3.application_notes: Complete organic NPK fertilizer from natural sources. High calcium content for cell wall strength. Feeds soil biology. Low burn potential for any season application.

cc_greens_4_0_8_sod_md_heritage.product_name: Country Club MD 4-0-8 with Heritage G
cc_greens_4_0_8_sod_md_heritage.application_notes: Ultra-low N greens fertilizer with Heritage G (azoxystrobin 0.31%) granular fungicide. Preventive control of brown patch, anthracnose, and other diseases on greens while delivering micronutrients with minimal growth.

cc_15_0_7_methex.application_notes: Greens-grade fertilizer with Meth-Ex 40 slow-release nitrogen (methylene urea). 3% iron and 1% manganese for color. SGN 100 mini-granule for fine-cut turf.

cc_18_0_4_methex.application_notes: Higher-nitrogen greens-grade Meth-Ex formulation. Methylene urea slow-release for 8-12 week feeding on greens. 2% Fe and 0.5% Mn for color enhancement.

proscape_17_0_3_momentum.application_notes: Fertilizer with Momentum broadleaf herbicide (2,4-D + triclopyr + clopyralid). Controls tough broadleaf weeds including clover, ground ivy, and wild violet. Apply when weeds are actively growing.

proscape_25_0_5_dimension.application_notes: High-nitrogen fertilizer with Dimension pre-emergent for crabgrass control. Economical formulation for large lawn care applications. Mesa slow-release nitrogen.

proscape_24_0_8_50_methex_dimension.application_notes: High-nitrogen Meth-Ex fertilizer with Dimension (dithiopyr) pre-emergent. Extended N feeding with crabgrass prevention. Methylene urea slow-release nitrogen.

proscape_22_0_4_barricade.application_notes: High-nitrogen fertilizer with Barricade (prodiamine) pre-emergent. Long residual crabgrass and goosegrass control. Apply early spring before soil temperature reaches 55F.

proscape_0_0_7_with_0_86_bifenthrin.application_notes: Zero-nitrogen insecticide granule on potash carrier. Controls surface-feeding insects including chinch bugs, sod webworms, billbugs, and ants. Apply and water in for grub control.

proscape_12_0_4_11fe.application_notes: High-iron fairway fertilizer for enhanced green color without excessive growth. 11% iron and 10% sulfur. Use when dark color is needed but nitrogen stimulation should be moderated.

proscape_0_0_0_24fe.application_notes: Pure iron granular for color only. No NPK. 24% iron (ferrous sulfate). Provides immediate dark green color response. Acidifies soil. No growth stimulation. Can be used anytime color is needed.

cc_greens_grade_lime.application_notes: Greens-grade (SGN 100) dolomitic lime for pH adjustment on fine-cut turf. Raises soil pH. Contains calcium and magnesium. Mini-granule works into greens canopy. Apply based on soil test.

proscape_lime_pelletized.application_notes: Pelletized calcium carbonate lime for pH correction. Dissolves to fine powder upon watering for rapid reaction. Apply based on soil test and buffer pH. Can be applied anytime.

proscape_gypsum_pelletized.application_notes: Pelletized calcium sulfate (gypsum). Supplies calcium and sulfur without changing soil pH. Improves soil structure and water infiltration in sodic (high-sodium) soils. 22% Ca, 17% S.

proscape_polyon_25_5_11.application_notes: 100% Polyon polymer-coated slow-release for 10-14 week feeding. Complete NPK with phosphorus. Consistent, predictable release based on soil temperature. Very low burn potential.

proscape_polyon_28_0_6.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated nitrogen for consistent extended release. High N for economical coverage. Temperature-driven release over 10-14 weeks.

proscape_26_2_11_polyon_mesa.application_notes: Dual slow-release technology combining Polyon polymer coating and Mesa methylene urea. Multiple release curves for extended, graduated feeding. Complete NPK.

proscape_24_0_12_50_scu.application_notes: 50% sulfur-coated urea (SCU) slow-release nitrogen. Economical controlled-release option. 6% sulfur from coating. Releases over 6-8 weeks depending on conditions.

proscape_33_0_10_scu.application_notes: High-nitrogen SCU formulation for maximum economy. Sulfur-coated urea provides 6-8 week controlled release. Very economical per acre cost. Good for commercial and municipal turf.

cc_16_0_8_sgn75.application_notes: Ultra-fine mini-granule (SGN 75) for putting greens. Smallest particle size for clean application on ultra-low cut turf. 50% Mesa slow-release. 2% Fe, 0.5% Mn for color.

cc_12_0_12_sgn75.application_notes: Ultra-fine (SGN 75) balanced greens fertilizer. 3% Fe, 1% Mn for color. Equal N-K for stress tolerance. Designed for ultra-low mowing heights on championship greens.

proscape_16_0_8_acelepryn.application_notes: Mesa slow-release fertilizer with Acelepryn (chlorantraniliprole) for grubs, ABW, sod webworms, and caterpillars. Season-long insect control with one application. 2% Fe for color.

proscape_20_0_8_mesa_no_phos.application_notes: Phosphorus-free Mesa formulation for maintenance where P is not needed. 50% controlled-release nitrogen. 2% iron for color. Good for states with phosphorus application restrictions.

proscape_13_0_5_2_4_d_trimec.application_notes: Fertilizer with Trimec Plus broadleaf herbicide (2,4-D + MCPP + dicamba + sulfentrazone). Controls tough weeds including ground ivy, wild violet, and spurge. Apply when weeds are actively growing.

proscape_28_3_10_50_mesa.application_notes: High-nitrogen complete NPK with Mesa slow-release. Contains phosphorus for soils requiring P supplementation. 50% controlled-release for extended feeding.

cc_fertilizer_plus_acti_iron.application_notes: Greens-grade fertilizer with enhanced micronutrient package. 6% iron, 2% manganese, 8% sulfur for maximum color response. Low-nitrogen for summer applications.

proscape_20_0_10_mesa.application_notes: 2:1 N:K Mesa formulation for general turf maintenance. 50% controlled-release for 8-10 weeks. 2% iron for color. Versatile fairway and sports turf product.

cc_3_0_20_pre_plant.application_notes: High-potassium greens-grade mini-granule for pre-plant and stress preparation. Very low nitrogen with iron and manganese. Builds K reserves before seeding, overseeding, or dormancy.

proscape_16_4_8_mesa.application_notes: Complete NPK Mesa formulation with moderate phosphorus. 50% controlled-release nitrogen. 2% iron. For turf needing phosphorus per soil test. Good for renovation areas.

proscape_25_2_5_mesa.application_notes: High-nitrogen Mesa with low phosphorus for soils needing minor P supplementation. 50% controlled-release. Economical per-acre cost.

cc_16_2_8_mesa.application_notes: Complete NPK greens-grade mini-granule with low phosphorus. 50% Mesa slow-release. 2% Fe, 0.5% Mn. For greens where soil tests indicate P need.

proscape_22_0_11_mesa.application_notes: 2:1 N:K Mesa formulation. 50% controlled-release nitrogen for 8-10 weeks. 1% iron for color. Good balance of nitrogen and potassium for fairway maintenance.

proscape_15_0_15_mesa.application_notes: Balanced 1:1 N:K Mesa formulation for fall fertilization and stress periods. 50% slow-release. 1% iron. Equal nitrogen and potassium for hardiness.

proscape_6_0_0_6fe_milorganite_alt.application_notes: Organic-based biosolid fertilizer with 4% iron. Feeds soil microbiology. Low burn potential. Higher application rates needed for desired N delivery. Contains calcium.

cc_md_16_0_8_pillar_g.product_name: Country Club MD 16-0-8 with Pillar G
cc_md_16_0_8_pillar_g.application_notes: Greens fertilizer with Pillar G (triticonazole + pyraclostrobin) dual-active fungicide. Broad-spectrum preventive disease control on greens including dollar spot, brown patch, and anthracnose.

cc_md_18_0_18_headway_g.product_name: Country Club MD 18-0-18 with Headway G
cc_md_18_0_18_headway_g.application_notes: Balanced greens fertilizer with Headway G (azoxystrobin + propiconazole) fungicide. Two FRAC groups for broad-spectrum disease control. Preventive and early curative activity.

proscape_0_0_26_dimension.application_notes: High-potassium carrier with Dimension pre-emergent. Provides crabgrass prevention with potassium nutrition. Zero nitrogen for early spring when N push is not desired.
